Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Shenzhen DERIER Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2001. We cooperate with internationally renowned jewelry masters such as Evert de Graeve, Pascal Sert, and Lars Heinz. It is a global jewelry high-end brand focusing on jewelry research and development, design, production and sales. 1000+ people, 30+ stores. Since 2010, DERIER has been included in the "Top 500 Most Valuable Brands" released by the World Brand Lab for three consecutive years, with a brand value of 2.362 billion.
In 2002, DERIER became a member of the standing director unit of China Gemstone Association;
In March 2004, DERIER won the honorary title of "Famous Brand in China's Jewelry Industry" issued by the State Administration for Industry and Commerce and China Gemstone Association.
In May 2004, 30 outstanding managers including brand founder Liu Xudong and Li Zekai won the "World Manager Achievement Award Future Leader", becoming the only one in the industry to receive this honor;
In 2005, DERIER became the only designated jeweler for the New Silk Road Model Contest; currently, DERIER has opened high-end stores in 31 cities in China, including Hangzhou, Ningbo, Chengdu, Chongqing, Wuhan, Shanghai, and Lanzhou, serving millions of people.
In 2006, Liu Xudong, chairman of the group, was elected as the vice president of the Sichuan International Chamber of Commerce. In 2007, he became the vice president of the Sichuan Jewelry Association. In 2008, he became the vice president of the Chengdu Jewelry Chamber of Commerce.
In 2009, the DERIER jewelry business team was invited to participate in the Basel International Jewelry Show
In 2010, the jewelry business team of DERIER was invited as the VIP guest of Japan's largest Tokyo International Jewelry Show to participate in the exhibition and as the ribbon-cutting guest.
In 2011, DERIER jewelry was awarded the 500 most valuable brands in China, with a brand value of 1.925 billion
In 2011, the DERIER jewelry business team went to Las Vegas, USA to participate in the International Jewelry Exhibition
In 2012, the DERIER jewelry business team participated in the Gold Jewelry Exhibition in Vicenza, Italy
In 2012, DERIER jewelry was awarded the 500 most valuable brands in China, with a brand value of 2.362 billion
In 2014, we established DERIER COLLEGE, focusing on cultivating and exporting jewelry industry talents for the world.
In 2015, DERIER Jewelry won the honorary title of "Excellent Enterprise in China's Jewelry and Jade Jewelry Industry in 2015".
In 2015, the DERIER jewelry business team went to Las Vegas, USA to participate in the International Jewelry Exhibition
In 2017, ABAS awarded DERIER the honor of "Top Ten Leading Brands in China (Industry)"
In 2018, we were invited to participate in the Munich Jewelry Show in Germany
In 2020, Liu Xudong, chairman of the group, was re-elected as the "Executive Director" of China Jewelry and Jade Jewelry Industry Association
In 2022, it will become the vice-chairman unit of Guangdong Jewelry Chamber of Commerce, and Liu Xudong, chairman of the group, will be elected as the vice-chairman of Shenzhen Jewelry Chamber of Commerce

As a well-known jewelry brand in the world, our jewelry has cooperated with many stars, such as. Wu Jinyan endorsed our "Bright Love" series. Wang Likun endorsed our "Bright Love X Ray" series, Chen Qiaoen endorsed our "Bright Love X Ray" series, Guo Caijie endorsed our "Star Series", DERIER has sponsored the movie "Follow Your Heart" and the TV series "The Time of You and Me"。
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
As a world-renowned jewelry brand established for more than 20 years, we have many precious design manuscripts, jewelry production, transportation, maintenance, sales and other data. At the same time, we also have a lot of data about jewelry publicity, promotion, explanation, etc. We established the DERIER Business School, and we have accumulated a lot of jewelry courseware, and we also hope to store this part of the data on the Filecoin network.

Therefore, these data are roughly:

Promotional pictures and live videos of DERIER jewelry products
Promotional pictures, videos, customer pre-sales and after-sales data of DERIER physical store
DERIER enterprise data, for example, DERIER's PPT, promotional articles, videos, team building content
DERIER designer's precious design draft, factory production environment, pictures
Honors received by DERIER, for example, DERIER has continuously won the award of 500 most valuable brands for many years
Pictures and videos of celebrities and models shooting, promoting and endorsement for DERIER
Data on events organized and attended by DERIER
Derier Business School courseware data
DERIER sponsored the movie "Like a Shadow" and the TV series "My Time with You", and the data in this part is very huge. dates.
